page.title: 10Local government , Himbleton
page.content: Local government in the area falls in the first instance to Mr.E.Sheldon of Worcester _ our County Council representative , secondly to Mr.J.Wythes of Crowle who represents us on Wychavon D.C. , and finally to a local parish council. This local council is known as Saleway Parish Council , it has 7 reps. who are elected loaclly - 2 from Oddingly , 1 from Hadzor , 1 from Sale Green & Huddington , 3 from Himbleton. Within the parish are also Shell,Earls Common,Phepson,Saleway,Shernal Green, and Dunhampstead. Probably the most important duty of the parish council is to advise on planning applications within its own area. The local planning authority (Wychavon D.C.) are responsible for final planning dicisions.
